TopicTitle: Please help me find an name for my future modular space station

Articles.Content:
So first, if this thread is in the wrong subforum, please move it to the correct subforum.

So, I am in need for an name for an future modular space station, which will be part of the Vondaren/Kondraki program.

So I would really appreciate it if you would suggest some names, out of which I could choose the name for the space station.
I assume you are using RSS (Just based on vessel size) so I would suggest something fitting, like Salyut Station, Soyuz Station, Apollo Station, Galaxy Station.

I assume you are using RSS (Just based on vessel size) so I would suggest something fitting, like Salyut Station, Soyuz Station, Apollo Station, Galaxy Station.

Actually, no i'm not using RSS.

And I would like names which are not based on real spacecraft names(Didn't mean to rant, just normally saying)

Actually, no i'm not using RSS.

And I would like names which are not based on real spacecraft names(Didn't mean to rant, just normally saying)

Just seems like a lot of fuel just to make orbit in your first post, considering the size of your payload.

But anyway, after a quick search I found this, a space ship name generator.

Just seems like a lot of fuel just to make orbit in your first post, considering the size of your payload.

But anyway, after a quick search I found this, a space ship name generator.

Thanks for telling me about the name generator.

About the rocket, there was some fuel left in the second stage after seperation.

We'd need as least some clues as to theme, though.

Personally, I quite like Principia [1]. Or Salviati [2].

Just find really obscure, impressive sounding words that have nothing to do with the vessel. Knismesis1. Krukolibidinous2. Obsolescence3. Stramineous.4

Apparently, the past tense of 'thrust' is 'thraste'.

1: Light tickling

2: The act of staring at one's crotch

3: The act of becoming obsolete

4: Having to do with straw
